Description: ***PLEASE READ BEFORE BIDDING*** Your complete satisfaction is of utmost importance, and we strive to offer the very best buying experience possible. If on the remote chance there is a problem, please contact us before leaving feedback and we will be more than willing to work with you to resolve it. We hope you are pleased with your purchase and will come back again! We are a pawn shop, not a music store, and so have limited knowledge of guitars. We describe and check every instrument as thoroughly as we can. Customer satisfaction is our main concern, so please contact us immediately if there are any problems.Description Spectrum Electric GuitarVery Good pre-owned condition. Tested and plays fine. The pickup selector switch has a buzz in the first, third and fifth positions. The second and fourth positions play quiet. No major cosmetic damage, just a few small nicks and some scuffs from normal use. Please view all the photos as they are part of the description. There is glare in some of the photos. These reflections are not marks on the guitar. You must have a street address for delivery. No P.O. Box.PaymentPayPal only. Payment is expected within 2 days of auction's end. Shipping Items will be shipped Monday through Friday, and in most instances within 24 hours of receiving payment.40186900 Track Page Views With Auctiva's FREE Counter
Title: Spectrum Electric Guitar
